alert.note: Alert for Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 5:20PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow showers and gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Broadwater, southeastern Meagher and Gallatin Counties through 600 PM MST... At 518 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking moderate to heavy snow showers and gusty winds along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of White Sulphur Springs to 12 miles southwest of Manhattan. Movement was east northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow, wind gusts up to 55 mph, and visibility as low as a half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel due to significantly reduced visibility and slippery roads. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Toston, Big Sky, Bozeman Hot Springs, Ringling, Gallatin Gateway, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Maudlow, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Lennep, Trident, Church Hill, Willow Creek, Menard and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. Use extreme caution if traveling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
